pageContext.claim: “The judge who sentenced Roger has been brutal. Take a look at what she's done to people. … Well, take a look at what she did for Hillary-related things, okay? It wasn't brutal there. But look at what -- what she did to people. Just take a look at what she's done.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is criticizing the judge who presided over Roger Stone's trial, Amy Berman Jackson, who imposed a shorter prison sentence than prosecutors requested. Judges do not have roving commissions allowing them to subject any person to criminal process, so it's not clear what Trump is suggesting the judge should have done regarding Hillary Clinton.
